reviewText:
Save your money.  Poor video work and hard to follow target sequences.  Go to You Tube and view the Gil Ash videos for free and receive a lot more information professionally done.  This video could have been done in half the time if they had removed redundancy in the dialog.  There are many articles for free on the Internet that cover his points in a few pages:  focus on the target after doing a quality setup prior to launching the target.

This person is a great shooter who has made a poor video.
I purchased this after a lesson with Anthony. He's a great instructor and this video is a must have for anyone wanting to improve their game.
Had replace copy lost while moving. Good instruction for difficult targets on disk 2.
Good video that will push me to get an individual lesson with him.
